strings.Value: "Yes, it's true. Regongar and I are together."
"You're right. Octavia and I are together."
"I've said it more than once: you're the only one for me."
{n}Tristian looks at you with apparent indifference, masking unspoken anxiety.{/n} "I wanted to know something, {name}. If you don't mind."
"I saw you talking to Regongar. You... seem closer to each other than our other companions. Is there something between you?"
"I saw you having fun with Octavia. It seemed there was... something special between the two of you. Is it true?"

{n}Tristian looks surprised.{/n} "Really? Strange, I thought... well, it doesn't matter. I'm sorry to pry." {n}Tristian turns away with a guilty look, but then suddenly casts a quick glance at you.{/n} "I hope you're not the only one who thinks so..."
"I... understand. Well..." {n}Tristian sighs and smiles warmly.{/n} "You're a wonderful couple. I hope all the happiness in the world awaits you."

{n}Tristian coughs.{/n} "I'm not... Oh, {name}, you know how to embarrass me!" {n}The priest laughs awkwardly, and then suddenly becomes serious.{/n} "I just hope you don't break anyone's heart. Anyway, I'm sure the others are much better at relationships than I am."
{n}A telltale blush appears on Tristian's face.{/n} "No! What are you talking about! I'm just..."
